      Create the panel - a labelled text field for the name and a labelled combo box to choose a species from.

      SpeciesDisplayer(Species species, java.awt.Font boldFont, java.awt.Font semiBoldFont)
      Create the species displayer for a specified species, displaying all of its attributes and its icon.
